SEARCH

Class Engine

java.lang.Object
Engine
public class Engine extends Object
Represents an engine of a ship or vehicle, with properties like type, power, and current speed. Provides methods to control the engine and adjust its speed.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Engine(String type, int power)
    Constructor to initialize the engine with a specific type and power.

  • Constructor Details

    • Engine

      public Engine(String type, int power)
      Constructor to initialize the engine with a specific type and power. Sets the initial speed to 3.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of the engine (e.g., "Diesel", "Electric").
      power - The power of the engine in horsepower (hp).

  • Method Details

    • isRunning

      public boolean isRunning()
      Checks if the engine is currently running by evaluating its speed.
      Returns:
      True if the engine is running (speed > 0), false otherwise.

    • setSpeed

      public void setSpeed(int newSpeed)
      Sets a new speed for the engine. If the new speed is greater than 9, the speed is not changed and an error message is displayed.
      Parameters:
      newSpeed - The new speed to set (maximum allowed is 9).

    • increase_speed

      public void increase_speed()
      Increases the engine speed by 1, up to a maximum speed of 9. Displays the current speed after each increase.

    • decrease_speed

      public void decrease_speed()
      Decreases the engine speed by 1, down to a minimum speed of 0. Displays the current speed after each decrease.

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Retrieves the type of the engine.
      Returns:
      The type of the engine (e.g., "Diesel").

    • getPower

      public int getPower()
      Retrieves the power of the engine in horsepower.
      Returns:
      The power of the engine in horsepower.

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the engine and prints a message indicating the engine is on.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops the engine and prints a message indicating the engine is off.

    • turnEast

      public void turnEast()
      Turns the ship to the east and prints a message indicating the direction.

    • turnWest

      public void turnWest()
      Turns the ship to the west and prints a message indicating the direction.

    • turnNorth

      public void turnNorth()
      Turns the ship to the north and prints a message indicating the direction.

    • turnSouth

      public void turnSouth()
      Turns the ship to the south and prints a message indicating the direction.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the engine, including its type and power.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string describing the engine's type and power.
